verses.name: Hebrews 10:20
verses.text: By a new and living way, which he hath consecrated for us, through the veil, that is to say, his flesh;

verses.name: Hebrews 10:21
verses.text: And having an high priest over the house of God;

verses.name: Hebrews 10:22
verses.text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith, having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience, and our bodies washed with pure water.

verses.name: Hebrews 10:23
verses.text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering; (for he is faithful that promised;)

verses.name: Hebrews 10:24
verses.text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works:
